DOC.brief_summary: This phase IV , comparative study evaluate efficacy safety Motiltone速 treatment patient functional dyspepsia . The study conduct follow method : multi-centers , double blind , randomization , parallel . The subject receive Motilitone速 or/and Pantoline速 .
